speaker.whotheyare: Britta Riley designs and builds urban farms  and other participatory artworks that explore the city.
speaker.whylisten: Britta Riley is an artist and technologist who makes crowdsourced R&D solutions for environmental issues. Her company, Window Farms was named one of the top 100 businesses to watch in 2010 by Entrepreneur Magazine. Windowfarms makes vertical hydroponic platforms for growing food in city windows.
